carrier.name: Unique from Chambers of Xeric
carrier.details: Valid uniques are any purple, kit, or dust. The uniques must be acquired under a member of your team's name. There are NO alts allowed but scaling is allowed. Take a screenshot at the end of the raid with the party size and raid panel to prove that alts were not used.

carrier.name: Completions of the Inferno
carrier.details: These completions must be done by UNIQUE team members.

carrier.name: Revenants Unique
carrier.details: This means _any_ unique. Weapons, avarice, totems all count, but they _cannot_ be obtained from a Revenant boss.

carrier.name: Penance Queen
carrier.details: Have one person take a TIMESTAMPED photo after killing penance queen. You must kill her 5 times. Additionally, kill 1000 chompies. Post timestamped before and after screenshots of your killcount.

carrier.name: Unique from Tombs of Amascut
carrier.details: Valid uniques are any purple. The uniques must be acquired under a member of your team's name.

battleship.name: Million GP Worth of Uniques from Any Boss, Raid, etc.
battleship.details: The uniques must be acquired under a member of your team's name. Uniques are classified as any item in the collection log. DT2 axe pieces count for 1/4 of the SRA, vestiges count as their respective ring minus the cost to make them. DT2 ORBs count. Contracts from Yama count for their GE value. Oathplate shards count. Noxious halberd pieces count for 1/3 the halberds GE value and the araxxyte fangs counts as the rancour minus the cost to make it.

battleship.name: Unique from Theatre of Blood
battleship.details: Valid uniques are any purple, HMT kit, or HMT dust. The unique must be in a member of your team's name.

battleship.name: Uniques from Elite Clues
battleship.details: However, if you have NOT YET DESTROYED a ship, you only need to get one (1) unique.

battleship.name: Purple from ANY Raid
battleship.details: Valid uniques are any purple. The uniques must be acquired under a member of your team's name. There are NO alts allowed but scaling chambers is allowed. If you do CoX, take a screenshot at the end of the raid with the party size and raid panel to prove that alts were not used.

cruiser.name: Unique from Tombs of Amascut
cruiser.details: Valid uniques are any purple. The unique must be in a member of your team's name.

cruiser.name: Uniques from the Fortis Colosseum
cruiser.details: Valid uniques are Tonalztics of ralos, echo crystal, uncut onyx, sunfire armor

submarine.name: Unique from the Chambers of Xeric
submarine.details: Valid uniques are any purple, kit, or dust. The uniques must be acquired under a member of your team's name. There are NO alts allowed but scaling is allowed. Take a screenshot at the end of the raid with the party size and raid panel to prove that alts were not used.

submarine.name: Tormented Demon Unique
submarine.details: Either a tormented synapse or burning claw

submarine.name: Unique from Nex OR 350 Nihil Shards
submarine.details: The unique must be in a member of your team's name. You MAY kill nex with members outside your team if necessary. Take screenshots of your nihil shards and submit them all ONLY once you have 350

destroyer.name: Unique from Yama OR 120 Oathplate shards
destroyer.details: You may only Yama with members of your team. Take screenshots of your oathplate shards and submit them all ONLY once you have 120

destroyer.name: Piece of a Voidwaker OR wilderness boss ring
destroyer.details: This can be any piece of a voidwaker or any of the three rings.
